arm_group.description: 6 months of smartphone assisted lifestyle coaching

brief_summary.textblock:
Patients who receive smartphone-assisted health coaching will have a significantly lower 24
      hour ambulatory blood pressure mean than patients who receive just health coaching

clinical_study.brief_title: Improved Self Management in Uncontrolled Systolic Hypertension

detailed_description.textblock:
Primary Outcome Measure: Mean 24 hour ambulatory blood pressure

      Secondary Outcome Measures: Profile of Mood States-SF Vigor Scale; Satisfaction with Life
      Scale; Positive and Negative Affect Schedule; Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale; SF - 12

intervention.description: smartphone with software provides self monitoring of exercise, diet and stress reduction; provision of timely reminders; photo-journaling of meals; secure text messaging

clinical_study.official_title: Investigating Improved Self Management in Uncontrolled Systolic Hypertension

primary_outcome.description: 24 hour ambulatory blood pressure assessed at baseline and 6 months follow up in experimental and control groups

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Profile of Mood States - SF Vigor Scale Satisfaction with Life Scale Positive and Negative Affect Schedule Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale; SF 12
secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of life self report measures

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
